pages.title: End Crystal Hoe
pages.text: $(li)The End Crystal Hoe is the best Hoe that exist in every dimension of this world.$(br)$(li)It even has more durability than a Netherite Hoe.

pages.name: End Crystal Hoe
pages.text: You can right click in a Grass or Dirt block while you are holding it in your hand to create Farmland.
